pages.text: $(l)Efficiency Upgrades$() increase the speed of production cycles in the Advanced Beehive and speed up the work of bees assigned to a Beepost.$(br2)They can be placed in both the machine's global upgrade slots and the bee-specific slots.
$(l)Quantity Upgrades$() give a chance for your bees to produce bonus items with each cycle. The more upgrades you install, the higher the chance for extra resources.
$(l)Range Upgrades$() increase the range of the production area around the machine. The more upgrades you install, the higher the farther away bees can work (especially useful for big farming areas).
